section.p: The provides detailed instructions for upgrading from any 1.1.x version to version 1.2.x.
customers: This guide does not include procedures for upgrading a high-availability deployment. For additional information, please contact your representative.

section.title: Supported clients and browsers
section.p: The following table identifies the supported combinations of client operating systems and web browsers.

section.title: Change history
section.p: The following list associates document part numbers and the important changes to this guide since the previous release. Some of the changes involve features or content, but others do not. For information about new or changed features, refer to the .

dlentry.dd: Add a description of a new feature, setting the connection timeout value of a resource pool, to the pre-upgrade chapter.
Add a procedure for the new feature to the post-upgrade chapter.
